text: (napiye!) Ovvoru tutarum tan makkalukkut telivaka vivarittuk kurum poruttu, antanta makkalin moliyaik konte (potanai puriyumaru) nam avarkalai anuppivaittom. (Antat tutarkal evvalavu muyarcitta potilum avarkal ceyyum nanmai timaikkut takkavaru) allah natiyavarkalai tavarana valiyil vittuvitukiran. (Narceyalkal ceyyum) avan virumpukiravarkalai nerana valiyil celuttukiran. Avan anaittaiyum mikaittavan, nanamutaiyavan avan
